programme.title: Netbusters 2025/26
programme.desc: Relive the best action from the Premier League with this fast-paced ISO angle highlights show, featuring every game and every goal from each matchround.

programme.title: PL Preview 2025/26 (Updated)
programme.desc: A tightly packed look-ahead to the forthcoming matchround with a mix of player interviews and special features.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: Leeds have lost just one of their last 28 league games (W19 D8), winning the last six in a row. However, they failed to win any of their last nine as a Premier League side (D2 L7), conceding 29 goals in that run.

programme.title: PL Moments 2025/26
programme.desc: PL Moments combines archive and first person testimony to revisit the very best games, goals, players and performances from the last 30 years.

programme.title: PL Rewind 2025/26
programme.desc: Tim Howard spent a decade as Evertons first choice goalkeeper, the club that defined his Premier League career. The American recalls his journey from New Jersey, via Old Trafford, to Goodison Park, and his most memorable moments between the posts.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26
programme.desc: We follow the remarkable journey of Olivier Giroud, from his Premier League days with Arsenal and Chelsea to Champions League glory and beyond. A World Cup winner known for his elegance and resilience, Girouds career has taken him from London to Milan, then to LA, and now back home with a move to Lille. As he begins this new chapter, we reflect on the highs, the hurdles, and the legacy of one of footballs most underrated and enduring strikers.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26
programme.desc: Extended sit-downs and more informal out and about interviews with the Premier Leagues biggest stars, providing players with a platform to tell their story in their own words.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26
programme.desc: The 34th season of the Premier League sees Liverpool defend its title against a host of teams keen for glory themselves. 20 teams are in the mix but only 1 champion will emerge ultimately.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26
programme.desc: We follow the remarkable journey of Olivier Giroud, from his Premier League days with Arsenal and Chelsea to Champions League glory and beyond. A World Cup winner known for his elegance and resilience, Girouds career has taken him from London to Milan, then to LA, and now back home with a move to Lille. As he begins this new chapter, we reflect on the highs, the hurdles, and the legacy of one of footballs most underrated and enduring strikers.

programme.title: Ram Aur Shyam
programme.desc: Ram escapes from his home when he learns that his abusive brother-in-law plans to kill him. Justice is meted out when Shyam, Ram's long-lost twin, accidentally takes his place.

programme.title: Ram Aur Shyam
programme.desc: Ram escapes from his home when he learns that his abusive brother-in-law plans to kill him. Justice is meted out when Shyam, Ram's long-lost twin, accidentally takes his place.

programme.title: Prem Geet
programme.desc: A poet falls in love with a girl and later realises that she is terminally ill. Despite being aware of her condition, he decides to marry her and keep her happy.

programme.title: Zulm Ko Jala Doonga
programme.desc: Frustrated by the constant discrimination meted out against him, a young man rebels against his village. However, a doctor's arrival in the village leads to a drastic change within the community.

programme.title: Mard
programme.desc: A police officer is punished for his honesty and transferred to an area controlled by a don. Challenging the gangster proves difficult for the cop due to the corruption of local law enforcement.

programme.title: Yodha
programme.desc: After he fails to save a hijacked flight, Arun, a soldier, is suspended. When he is found onboard another hijacked flight, his intentions are questioned.

programme.title: Kunwara
programme.desc: Raju and Urmila fall deeply in love and vow to reunite in India. However, complications arise when Raju agrees to pose as Sharmila's husband before her family.

programme.title: Gabbar Is Back
programme.desc: The city's administration wrongs Aditya, a commoner. To avenge his tragedy, he disguises himself as a vigilante, Gabbar, and teams up with honest government officers to expose the corrupt.

programme.title: Arjun
programme.desc: Arjun has faced an uphill task, be it his education, career or even family life. When widespread corruption, crime and injustice take a toll on him, he decides to revolt but more betrayals await him.

programme.title: Akhiyon Se Goli Maare
programme.desc: Bhangari Dada wants his daughter, Kiran, to get married to a gangster. Kiran, however, falls in love with Raj, a wealthy man, and convinces him to pose as a gangster to impress her father.

programme.title: Mahaan
programme.desc: A lawyer goes into hiding after being falsely accused of committing a crime, while his wife gives birth to twins. Years later, fate reunites the family under difficult circumstances.

programme.title: Grahasthi
programme.desc: Shankar, a widower with three children, finds his life changed after being jailed for stealing INR 10,000. He then struggles to stay in touch with his family by writing letters to them from prison.

programme.title: Khal-Naaikaa
programme.desc: A pregnant woman's life turns into a nightmare after her husband commits suicide and she loses her unborn child. Embittered, the woman embarks on a quest for revenge.

programme.title: No Problem
programme.desc: Yash and Raj, childhood friends and petty thieves, rob a bank, causing the innocent manager to be blamed. To prove his innocence, the manager devises a plan to apprehend the culprits.

programme.title: R... Rajkumar
programme.desc: Romeo, a ruffian, starts working for Shivraj, a drug lord, and they end up falling for the same girl, Chanda. Soon, a fight between the two ensues to win her over.

programme.title: Mujrim
programme.desc: Yashoda, a widow, brings up her children with love and honesty. However, she is disappointed when her son Shankar is arrested for breaking the law and disowns him.

programme.title: Aunty No. 1
programme.desc: To help his friends, Gopi dresses up as their aunt to solve their problems. However, he gets into a hilarious situation where he must avoid two suitors trying to woo him.

programme.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
programme.desc: While travelling across Europe, Raj and Simran unexpectedly grow close, only to be separated by family expectations, prompting Raj to fight for love and tradition.

programme.title: Ganga Ki Saugand
programme.desc: Thakur Jaswant Singh, a tyrannical village landlord, assaults Jeeva's mother and has him thrown out of the village. Jeeva returns as a dacoit in order to take revenge.

programme.title: Gumnaam
programme.desc: A group stranded on a mysterious island must confront eerie occurrences and deadly secrets as an unknown presence begins eliminating them one by one in an isolated mansion.

programme.title: Nachnewale Gaanewale
programme.desc: Two friends sing and dance at functions for a living and decide to get their respective children married to each other. To their dismay, the son refuses to comply.

programme.title: Dillagi
programme.desc: Ranvir and Rajvir, two inseparable brothers, support each other through thick and thin. However, they find themselves in a dilemma when both of them fall in love with the same woman.

programme.title: Bandhan
programme.desc: After his wife's demise, a man tries to start over with her estranged family. When he falls in love with his wife's twin, he fears that his efforts to mend broken relations will go to waste.

programme.title: Izzatdaar
programme.desc: When Brahm Dutt, a wealthy businessman, is falsely convicted on murder charges, he enlists the help of a boy to exact revenge on Indrajeet, his cruel son-in-law and the cause of all his miseries.

programme.title: Singham Returns
programme.desc: Bajirao Singham, an honest police officer, encounters Babaji, a god-man with connections to high profile politicians, when he investigates the death of an officer from his team.

programme.title: Vardi
programme.desc: Constable Bhagwan is killed by Lalchand, a gangster. Years later, Bhagwan's son Ajay, along with his father's close associate Inspector Verma, tries to capture Lalchand and bring him to justice.

programme.title: Adventures of Tarzan
programme.desc: Ruby ventures into the forest searching for a legendary tribe but encounters Tarzan and falls for him. However, her father and fianc plot to capture him and sell him to the circus.

programme.title: Aashik Aawara
programme.desc: Jai, raised by a kind thief, lives as a con artist and falls for Jyoti but his love story takes a turn when he uncovers a shocking truth about her father that changes everything.

programme.title: Benny and Babloo
programme.desc: When their restaurant is shut down, Benny and Babloo move to Mumbai in search of jobs where their lives change when one gets a job at a five-star hotel while the other is employed at a dance bar.

programme.title: Dekh Tamasha Dekh
programme.desc: The death of a religiously ambiguous man in a rural Indian town leads to tensions between two factions of the Hindu and Muslim communities over the body.

programme.title: Kasam
programme.desc: Kisna, a police officer, goes undercover in a village to expose a drug ring. He manages to convince the villagers to surrender but things take a turn when the police guns down the villagers.

programme.title: Partner
programme.desc: A love expert helps a clumsy man win over his dream girl, only to face unexpected twists when he finds himself entangled in his own complicated romance.

programme.title: Sapne Saajan Ke
programme.desc: Shalini, who has always wanted her daughter, Jyoti, to marry a rich man, is happy that she has found Deepak to be her life partner. However, no one knows that he is only pretending to be wealthy.

programme.title: Meri Jung
programme.desc: Deepak Verma lives happily with his family, but things change when he is prosecuted by Thakral for murder. His son, Arun, vows to exact revenge against Thakral and prove his father's innocence.

programme.title: Kya Kehna
programme.desc: A young university student's world is rocked when her brief involvement with a wealthy playboy results in her pregnancy.

programme.title: Jeet
programme.desc: Karan, a gangster, falls in love with Kajal, but she marries Raju because of her father's poor health. Later, when Raju finds out about his father's illegal business, Karan is hired to kill him.

programme.title: Amar Akbar Anthony
programme.desc: Three brothers, each raised in different religious households, reunite after many years in a chance encounter. They set out to take revenge on those responsible for separating them.

programme.title: Chehraa
programme.desc: Reena and Akash, two psychiatry students, plan to get married to each other. However, things turn upside down when Akash falls in love with Megha.

programme.title: Sansani: The Sensation
programme.desc: Two men arrive at a deserted railway station and take shelter in the nearby guesthouse. Soon, after their arrival, the region is haunted with a series of murders.

programme.title: Sangharsh Aur Vijay
programme.desc: Badri is the protector of Badrinath temple. However, when a woman falls in love with him, his guru decides against making Badri his successor.

programme.title: Loafer
programme.desc: Seenu, a man who wants to go to Dubai, meets and falls in love with Madhumati. When he discovers that a dreaded don has killed his friend and Madhumati's brother, he sets out to exact revenge.

programme.title: Take Off
programme.desc: Sameera, an Indian nurse working in Iraq, and her colleagues are held hostage by terrorists. Later, Indian ambassador Manoj uses his wit to rescue them and get them out of the country alive.

programme.title: Fightro Ka Badshah
programme.desc: A gangster develops feelings for a beautiful woman and soon, they fall in love with each other. However, she is oblivious to the fact that he is a criminal.

programme.title: Ek Janbaaz Police Officer
programme.desc: Bharat, an honest cop gets transferred to Durgapur which is ruled by Simhadri, a criminal. He decides to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: Ek Tha Tiger
programme.desc: While on a mission to retrieve data in Dublin, RAW agent, Tiger, falls in love with a woman who, he later finds, is an ISI agent. Later they deceive both their agencies to live life on their terms.

programme.title: Garam
programme.desc: Varala, a jobless young man, leaves his home to prove himself to his father. However, before achieving his goal, he falls in love with Sameera and tries to woo and save her from gangster Biju.

programme.title: Darbar
programme.desc: Aaditya, a high-ranking law enforcement official, sets out to eradicate the city's gangsters. As the events unfold, it becomes clear that his motivations are deeply personal.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Removed from their community and denied all opportunities for change, three childhood friends resort to illegal activities to survive.

programme.title: Thugs
programme.desc: Caught in the turmoil of prison life, a determined man forges alliances with fellow inmates, plotting a daring plan to escape and regain their freedom.

programme.title: DD Returns
programme.desc: An event manager and his friends hide the money they stole in a haunted bungalow to evade the police but when they go back to retrieve it, the ghosts force them to play a dangerous game.

programme.title: Meri Saugandh
programme.desc: Ramu loves Lakshmi, whose father is the chief of the village. In order to prove his love, Ramu must win a challenge posed by a rival village and beat Giridhar, who is also keen on marrying Lakshmi.

programme.title: Devi Dharisanam
programme.desc: Bhavani is an orphan who grows up in the temple of Goddess Devi, under the protection of a tiger. Problems arise when Ramesh marries her and deserts her in a few days.

programme.title: Mantra Shakti
programme.desc: This is Film - Drama Category

programme.title: Mera Insaaf
programme.desc: Sekhar and Madhurima's happily married life is ruined when he's falsely accused of being Maoist by corrupt officials. However, Geeta, a journalist, tries to prove his innocence but to no avail.

programme.title: Kabali
programme.desc: A man spends 25 years in prison for fighting against oppression. Old but still bloodthirsty, he decides to seek revenge against his enemies upon his release.

programme.title: Sangathamizhan
programme.desc: Murugan, a happy-go-lucky young man, falls in love with the daughter of Sanjay, an industrialist. However, trouble arises when Sanjay notices that Murugan looks like a figure from his dark past.

programme.title: Guardian
programme.desc: An unavenged woman returns from the dead to terrify and terrorise those who tormented her when she was alive.

programme.title: Madhagaja
programme.desc: The wife of one of two rival dons sends her son to a distant land to shield him from their relentless feud. However, the son, raised as an orphan, eventually returns to the brutal world of violence.

programme.title: The Family Star
programme.desc: A hardworking middle-class man, who takes his family responsibilities very seriously, meets a research student renting his penthouse named Indu, who changes his life.

programme.title: Tantra
programme.desc: Rekha, a woman with the ability to perceive spirits, sees her life take a dark turn when she encounters a sinister black magic practitioner.

programme.title: Main Hoon Namodilwala
programme.desc: This is Film - Drama Category

programme.title: Qaidi No 420
programme.desc: A kabbadi player is arrested for the murder of his wife on their wedding night. However, the police officer investigating the case finds other clues that lead him on a different trail.

programme.title: Danveer
programme.desc: Praveen, the spoilt grandson of a landlord, sets out to complete his education in order to inherit his grandfather's wealth. In the process, he learns some valuable lessons about life.

programme.title: Lucknow Central
programme.desc: Kishen, an inmate in a Lucknow jail, yearns to be set free. When he learns that a few prisoners must form a band, he sees it as his ticket to freedom.

programme.title: What the Fish
programme.desc: Sudha hands over the responsibility of her house and pet fish to her niece's fiance before leaving for a holiday. When she returns, all seems fine until she opens the bathroom door.

programme.title: Bol
programme.desc: The patriarch of a religious Muslim family refuses to accept his transgender son, which creates a conflict within the family and ends up tearing them apart.

programme.title: Kannum Kannum Kollaiyadithaal
programme.desc: Siddharth and Kalli never seem to be short on money. However, when they meet the women of their dreams, they are pushed into reconsidering their career choices.

programme.title: Dus
programme.desc: Jamwaal, a terrorist, plans to wreak havoc in Canada when the Indian Prime Minister visits the nation. A team of special agents from India are sent to catch the terrorist.

programme.title: F2: Fun and Frustration
programme.desc: Two young men dream of controlling their wives after marriage, but their chauvinistic mindset backfires, leading to a series of hilarious and troublesome situations.

programme.title: Dhruva
programme.desc: A committed police officer, Dhruva, uncovers a web of organised crime headed by a scientist, Siddharth Abhimanyu. But when Dhruva tries to build a case against him, he faces many challenges.

programme.title: Andhadhun
programme.desc: Akash, a piano player pretending to be visually-impaired, unwittingly becomes entangled in a number of problems as he witnesses the murder of a former film actor.

programme.title: Raththam
programme.desc: While investigating his friend's murder, Ranjith, a journalist, unearths the sinister network responsible for a series of crimes.

programme.title: Munjya
programme.desc: Bittu awakens Munjya, a fearsome spirit with an insatiable desire for marriage, who relentlessly hunts him down in a chilling pursuit.

programme.title: Sanga Thamizhan
programme.desc: Murugan, a happy-go-lucky young man, falls in love with the daughter of Sanjay, an industrialist. However, trouble arises when Sanjay notices that Murugan looks like a figure from his dark past.

programme.title: Rakshak
programme.desc: After his childhood sweetheart Anusha leaves him to be with her classmate, Kathir loses his mind and abducts her on her wedding day.

programme.title: Veera Sivaji
programme.desc: Sivaji, a taxi driver, strives to raise money for the surgery of his niece. However, chaos ensues, when he gets deceived and strives to overcome the challenges.

programme.title: Darling 2
programme.desc: Five friends on a holiday in Valparai find their getaway turning eerie when they sense the haunting presence of a friend who recently died by suicide.

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: Kunal belongs to a middle-class family and aspires to become a film star. He gets his dream opportunity when he is asked to stand in for Karan, a producer's son who looks exactly like him, in a film.

programme.title: Dashing Jigarwala 2
programme.desc: When the students of the Travancore Maharaja College start to form gangs and engage in crime and brutal fights, Edward Livingston, an English professor decides to restore order in the campus.

programme.title: Trial Period
programme.desc: A single mother seeks the help of an unemployed man when her son makes the unusual request to have a father for a 30-day trial period.

programme.title: Rider
programme.desc: As love blossoms between orphans Chinnu and Kitty, fate separates them as children. However, they grow up yearning to find each other.

programme.title: Dasara
programme.desc: In a town that is dependant on coal mining, the lives of three childhood friends turn chaotic when they get into a fight with the son of the village headman.

programme.title: Stree
programme.desc: In the eerie townscape of Chanderi, dressmaker Vicky falls for a mysterious woman with a supernatural aura. His heart sinks at the possibility that she might be Stree, the resentful man-hunter.

programme.title: Vikram
programme.desc: A special agent investigates a murder committed by a masked group of serial killers. However, a tangled maze of clues soon leads him to the drug kingpin of Chennai.

programme.title: Chor Bazaar
programme.desc: Bachchan Saab, a small-time thief, is in love with a girl from Chor Bazaar, which is famous for stolen goods. However, his life turns upside down when he stumbles across a stolen diamond.

programme.title: Asoka
programme.desc: Asoka, the heir to the Maurya Empire, is sent on an exile for having fought with his half-brother, Susima. While travelling south, he meets Kaurwaki, the princess of Kalinga, and falls for her.

programme.title: Wagah
programme.desc: An Indian soldier falls in love with a Muslim girl near the India-Pakistan border. However, when a riot breaks out in the area, the man finds his love and his life at risk.

programme.title: Department
programme.desc: Inspector Mahadev Bhosale recruits Shiv Narayan, a suspended brave police officer, to form a hit squad. Soon after Shiv joins the gangster-turned-minister Sarjerao Gaikwad, Mahadev and Shiv turn foes.

programme.title: Laal Singh Chaddha
programme.desc: Laal Singh Chaddha, a man with a disability, recounts the early years of his life to a passenger on a train. Now, his only wish is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart, Rupa.

programme.title: Parking
programme.desc: A parking spot frays the relationship between two neighbours of different generations and world views. Soon, the two men find themselves in an escalating battle to have the space all to themselves.

programme.title: Zombie Reddy
programme.desc: Chaos ensue as Mario, a game developer, and his gang of friends get entangled in a family feud and an enigmatic zombie attack in Rayalaseema, while attending a friend's wedding.

programme.title: Dasvi
programme.desc: Ganga Ram Chaudhary, a corrupt and uneducated politician, goes to jail due to the efforts of the police. However, he soon discovers the value of education and decides to earn his 10th-grade diploma.

programme.title: Surya's Saturday
programme.desc: Surya, a young man with anger issues, channels his emotions on Saturdays, because of a promise to his deceased mother. However, things get complicated when he decides to confront a corrupt cop.

programme.title: Main Hoon Dandadhikari
programme.desc: Following his father's death, a man gives up on his dream to become a film-maker and joins the police force. He then attempts to track down a psychopathic killer who targets schoolgirls.

programme.title: City of Gold
programme.desc: A mill owner decides to shut down his mill and redevelop it into a shopping complex. Following this, the mill workers are left jobless and they try to raise their voices but are tragically silenced..

programme.title: Masti
programme.desc: Three college friends, who are bored with their marriages, decide to spice up their lives by indulging in an extramarital affair. Things go awry when they become the prime suspects of a murder.

programme.title: Raa Raa
programme.desc: Raj Kiran, a filmmaker who is down on his luck, tries to revive his career by shooting a horror movie in a dingy bungalow. However, he and his crew are unaware that the bungalow is actually haunted.

programme.title: Tera Intezaar
programme.desc: Rounak, an art gallery owner, who is in love with a painter, Veer, is left distraught when the latter mysteriously disappears. Unable to cope with the loss, she sets out to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Mission Mangal
programme.desc: Tara Shinde and Rakesh Dhawan lead the team of Indian scientists who work tirelessly to launch India's first satellite to Mars.

programme.title: Amaran
programme.desc: Major Mukund Varadarajan, a commissioned officer in the Rajput Regiment of the Indian Army conducts a counterterrorism operation while being deployed to Jammu and Kashmir.

programme.title: ACP Shiva
programme.desc: Shivakumar IPS, a corrupt police officer, joins GK, a local politician, in his immoral activities. However, when GK's brother kills his best friend, he decides to turn over a new leaf.

programme.title: Ugram
programme.desc: Shiva, a reckless CI officer, often lands himself in trouble. However, his impulsive actions take a dark turn when his family goes missing from a hospital after an accident.

programme.title: Satyabhama
programme.desc: ACP Satyabhama embarks on an investigation into a missing person case, which leads her to uncover dark secrets hidden within the town. However, as she delves deeper, her past begins to haunt her.

programme.title: Gully Rowdy
programme.desc: A young man tries to find a balance between his love interest and friends. Meanwhile, his friends convince him to stay rowdy.

programme.title: Pappu Can't Dance Saala
programme.desc: Next-door neighbours Vidyadhar, an orthodox Hindu man, and Mehak, an urban dancer, cannot stand each other. However, they must live together when their apartments get raided.

programme.title: Thagadu
programme.desc: In order to quench his thirst for historical knowledge, a young student delves into an incomplete story about a treasure hunt filled with mysteries.

programme.title: Rowdy Sardar
programme.desc: A young man with a traumatic childhood rises up the ranks to become a dreaded gangster after being a victim of corruption and injustice.

programme.title: Rd 64 Session 1 (Court 1)
programme.desc: The BWF World Championships is the most prestigious badminton competition, offering the most ranking points. The winners of the tournament are World Champions of the sport and are awarded a gold medal. The tournament started in 1977. Starting 2006, the tournament was changed to an annual event on the BWF calendar. The tournament is not held during the Summer Olympics years to avoid schedule conflicts.

programme.sub-title: Halo World Snooker C'ship 2025 (Ronnie O'Sullivan vs Zhao Xintong)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive 500,000 from a total prize fund of 2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.
